login-page.title: Login
login-page.instruction: This chat will guide you through the system. You will find it to the left of the screen. Please login below.
login-page.video: Click to watch the IBF Video Guide.
login-page.note: NOTE: This dashboard works best in Chrome, Firefox, Safari and Microsoft Edge. The dashboard is not compatible with Internet Explorer.

aggregates-component.more-information: Click for more info on this indicator.
